price: No indeed! Their hearts have been stained by what they used to commit[3]!
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: [3] i.e., their sins and evil deeds.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
